alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson; Hopkins; McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 10:51AM EDT until June 29 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR WESTERN DAVIESS...SOUTHEASTERN HENDERSON...MCLEAN...NORTHEASTERN HOPKINS AND NORTHEASTERN WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 951 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sebree to near Calhoun to near Masonville, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Owensboro, Calhoun, Livermore, Stanley, St. Joseph, Beech Grove, Masonville, Island, Moseleyville and Hebbardsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 129 and 132. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 7 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
